text: Some of the sailors who returned from their long voyages would visit Simbad, the Paralympics. Simbad closed his eyes and told them the adventures of his own inner journeys. To make them more realistic, they were sometimes assigned to Odisea. “I am sure,” Simbad thought as he sat alone, “that he never left his house either.” FIN The Cheshire Cat, 1965
title: Héroes II
author: Enrique Anderson Imbert
